name: Appointment of Shri Amit Garg, IPS(AP:93), Addl. Director, SVPNPA as Director, SVPNPA

details.Office Memorandum:
Sub: Appointment of Shri Amit Garg, IPS(AP:93), Addl. Director, SVPNPA as Director, SVPNPA.
The undersigned is directed to refer to the subject cited above and to convey approval of the Appointments Committee of the Cabinet for appointment of Shri Amit Garg, IPS(AP:93) as Director, SVPNPA (Level-16 in the pay matrix) against existing vacancy from the date of assumption of charge of the post and till date of his superannuation i.e. 31.10.2027 or until further orders, whichever is earlier.
2. The date of assumption of charge of the post by the officer may be intimated to this Ministry.
Under Secretary to the Govt. of India
Tel No. 23094038
To
Director,
SVP National Police Academy,
Hyderabad.

1. Chief Secretary to the Govt. of Andhra Pradesh, Amaravati.
2. Directors General of Police, Andhra Pradesh, Amaravati.
3. Directors/Directors General, BSF/CRPF/CISF/IB/ITBP/SSB/CBI/BPR&D/NDRF/NCRB/NIA/NSG/SPG.
4. DoP&T {Ms. Sakshi Mittal (Director), New Delhi}, New Delhi w.r.t. their communication No. 6/34/2024-EQ(SM-I) dated 21.09.2024.
5. Director General (Media & Communication), MHA.
6. PS to HM/PS to MOS (N)/PS to MOS (BS).
